sub_title: Industrial Engineer - Project Management at FedEx
summary:
Contact: renan.flauzino@gmail.com  Mobile: +34 613582514
EU Citizen - Multilingual professional: English - Portuguese - Italian

Industrial Engineer - Performance Management, Process and Continuous Improvement Engineer - with strong working experience in Canada, Brazil, Portugal, Ireland, United Kingdom and The Netherlands. 

- Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP) knowledge obtained in one of the most important players in the Medical Device industry, Siemens Healthineers.

- Strong immersion in controlled industrial environment, mostly from food and medical devices industries, as an Industrial Engineer at Siemens Healthineers and Process Engineer at Kerry Foods. Best Manufacturing Practices, Hygiene and Sanitation. Highly skilled in applying engineering and problem solving tools: Kaizen, 5S, 5W, VSM, Agile Visual Management, 5W2H, 8D, A3.

- Skilled Project Leader, able to lead multidisciplinary Kaizen groups and a massive equipment acquisition/ investment project that successfully delivered cost reduction and savings.

- Practical skills as Quality Engineer being capable of performing quality audits and statistical analysis in one of South America's largest steel manufacturers.

- Project Management skills proved when leading continuous improvement and implementing Lean Manufacturing in an Irish Lighting Manufacturer.

- Other competences also include applying TPM, PDCA, SMED, Internal Audits, KPIs management, Performance Management, Value Stream Mapping (VSM), GROWs methodology, People Leadership Practices (PLP), Hoshin Kanri, Continuous Dialogue, Structured Problem Solving, FMEA, PFMEA, Root-Cause Analysis, Trend Analysis, Ishikawa, CAPA and Optimisation

-Proficient user of Office, Arena, Visio, Minitab and SAP.

education.degree_name: Manufacturing Engineering student - Sandwich graduate program

education.field_of_study: English as a Second or Foreign Language/ESL Language

projects.title: Patient Journey Modeling and Simulation of a Walk-in Clinic Process
projects.description:
Patient Journey Modelling Architectures (PaJMa) and simulation are effective
techniques to model and analyze real processes in the health care arena. PaJMa
enables to represent the process based on the patient view, which leads to a deep
understand of the process and improvement suggestions. The statistical analysis and
simulation are indispensable to quantitatively evaluate the emergency care process,
determine patient arrival rates, waiting time and staff performance. The goal of this case
study is to apply Patient Journey Modeling, statistical analysis and simulation to model a
real case and analyze it. Since these tools are effective to study and represent
emergency departments’ process, the simulation results were compatible with the reality
of the Walk-in clinic and what-if scenarios could be developed in order to suggest
improvements. The PaJMa of the Walk-in clinic developed with Visio software indicated
the different steps, documents, staff role and technology involved in the clinic process.
Statistical analysis and simulation led to important results as well: there is a discrepancy
between morning and afternoon shifts and how an extra doctor in the busiest hours can
help to reduce the clinical visit queue.

profile_positions.title: Industrial Engineer - Project Management
Industrial Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Mullan Lighting is an Irish Lighting Manufacturer producing a range of bespoke products applied for several suppliers worldwide.

Working as a Continuous Improvement Leader actively involved in implementing a Lean Manufacturing strategy. 

-  Developing continuous improvement projects and activities as such as layout design and improvement, 5S, A3, performance management and use of problem solving tools. This involve strictly interaction with production management and quality control in order to introduce standardise work and increase productivity; 

- Leading the deployment of  stock and raw material control system and correction of BOMs and managing international suppliers in order to improve delivery accuracy.

- Developing and managing KPIs,  SOPs and performing on the job training, process mapping and stock management (MPS, MRP).

The main achievement was to successfully deploy system to control raw material from the scratch, which improved stock management, stock accuracy and stocktaking.
profile_positions.title: Continuous Improvement Lead

profile_positions.description:
Kerry Group is an Irish company leader in global food ingredients, with a large range of products on the food and beverage industries, above all on the B2B.  

Working as a Process Engineer Graduate leading process development  and Lean Manufacturing projects focused on Statistical Process Control (SPC) and performance management. Responsible for measuring and controlling productions KPI  such as machine downtime and production waste and also leading PDCA groups focused on loss and waste reduction.

Duties also include implementing and calculating OEE and measuring the financial benefits of the increase in OEE. Involved in visual management and layout improvement as well. 

The main achievement was to detect the opportunity of acquiring an overturnable spiral mixer that allowed for a reduction of 1 operator per shift, which generated annual savings of $200,000.
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer Graduate

profile_positions.description:
Villares Metals is a steel manufacturing company that provides steel bars, sections, wire rod, rebar, carbon, alloyed, mechanical construction, stainless, and tool steel to industries such as aeronautics, automotive, medical, energy, oil, and gas.

Responsibilities as  Quality Engineering Intern included statistical analysis of production waste and rework. Performing critical analysis of regulations and audits. 

Duties also included performance management, process development and improvement and the maintenance of ISO/TS 16949 and ISO 9001.  Project leader on FMEA, MSA and 8D implementation as well.  

The main achievement was the planning and development of MSA project in order to ensure 100% conformity with 2015’s external audit. The following topics were approached in the MSA project: Gauge R&R, Bias, Linearity and Stability.
profile_positions.title: Quality Engineer Intern

profile_positions.description:
Jacobs Douwe Egberts is a Dutch coffee and tea producer and sellers with a range of products for retail and out of home markets in Europe, Brazil, Australia, Thailand, and internationally. 

Responsible to manage and lead continuous improvement through Lean Manufacturing tools, introducing production KPI management, Kaizen implementation.  

This role also includes  performance management, procedure elaboration and on the job training. 

Responsibilities included leadership of Continuous improvement projects in both Focused Improvement and Autonomous Maintenance pillars of TPM. 

Main achievements: promoted to Lean Manufacturing Analyst after 6 months as an intern. Palletizer machine downtime reduction of 57%.
profile_positions.title: Lean Manufacturing Analyst

profile_positions.description: Responsibilities included the monitoring and operation of high platform systems (mainframe), customer service (International project), I.T. and administrative duties.
